com.viaoa.jsp

Class OAForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.jsp.OABase
      • com.viaoa.jsp.OAForm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class OAForm
extends OABase
implements java.io.Serializable
    Controls an html form and it's components Form submission support for multipart messages, errorMessage, hiddenMessages default forwardUrl send script to page (addScript) manage ajax or regular submit calls each component 3 times on submission: before, onSubmit, getReturn js script
    Author:
    vvia
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
